resources.string: Sign up by clicking on the Sign In button. Thank you for choosing OTTAA Project.
To renew your license please contact us.
Thank you for choosing OTTAA Project.
Your trial period has just begun. Thank you for choosing OTTAA Project.
Sorry, for the first use you need to be connected to internet. Sorry for this inconvenience.
Hello I am Juan, I have communication problems and I use this system, I need you to wait for me.
Choose the calendar with your daily routine.
It allows to use the application by scanning
Allow to disable the function Edit Pictograms.
Sorry, these pictograms can not be edited.
ERROR: 112. The function is not available in your device.
ERROR: 312. The Google Play services APK is not up-to-date please install the latest version.
ERROR: 222. We are having problems to connect to the server, please try again later.
Do you want to save changes ?
Do you want to restore the factory settings ?
Do you want to create a new Pictogram ?
Do you want to delete the selected Pictogram ?
Do you want to delete the selected Group ?
Now, we are going to guide you to create a sentence with voice using OTTAA Project.
Find share configuration options on the top bar.
Select the pictogram you want by clicking on it.
We are ready! Touch the OTTAA logo to start talking.
Touch the reset icon, or press the back key, to create a new sentence.
Touch the spinner to\nfind more related pictos.
Removes one or all pictograms from phrase ,use the short click to remove one pictogram or use the long click to remove all pictograms from phrase
You can choose the picto you want by clicking it.\n Press and hold to edit a picto\nor delete it.
Pressing the \"plus\" you can\ncreate your own picto.
Add more pictos to this gallery
Pressing the \"link\" button you can\nadd more pictos to this gallery.

You will find the picto you want by
pressing one of the categories.
 Press and hold the selected category
to edit it of delete it.
Pressing the \"plus\" button you can\ncreate your own category.
Pressing inside the circle you can change the pictos image.
What do you want to say?
Edit the text so the picto\nwill say whatever you want.
Press the OTTAA logo to\nplay the text of the picto.
Categorize the picto based on the Fitzgerald color code to improve the output. Green : Actions ,Yellow:People ,Blue:Adjectives ,Orange: Nouns ,Magenta: Miscellaneous
You can link this category with\nthe calendar or with a GPS location.
Link this group with a Calendar entry
You can link this group with certain event\nso at that time and date, this pictos will popup.
Link this set of pictograms with certain GPS location.\nso when are near that location the pictos will popup\nDont forget to set the desired location in settings.
Choose the pictograms for the group
Are you sure you want to close Edit Picto ?
Do you want to save it ?
Please write the name of the Pictogram
Select the pictograms you want to link with the group
We are sorry you need internet to use this feature.
Here are the recommended options, sorted by priority.

In case of being a professional it is recommended: Have a profile for each patient. In this way the user increases their vocabulary
The pictograms are loaded according to the user age.
Select the color of the screen scanning
Desktop Mode: Joystick oriented horizontally Chair Mode: Joystick oriented vertically
In order to have a better prediction, it is necessary that you select the gender and age of the user in order to be able to order the pictograms
We are working on this function, it will be available soon
This function will control screen scanning function with the OTTAA Project scroll

The game is to guess which is the winning pictogram 1) The system issues the following question aloud: What is the \"Name of Pictogram\" pictogram? 2) The user selects the pictogram. 3) The system verifies if it is the winner or not and accordingly emits a sound
Alright now let\'s say each of the pictograms aloud
" Answer the questions by choosing the right pictogram. Learn by playing!"
Now we are going to join the pictograms
Select the operation of on-screen scanning
Use OTTAA Project with screen scanning, connect accessible buttons and much more.
Get access to educational games that allow you to evaluate vocabulary in a fun way
With the premium version you will have access to a detailed report of the use you make of OTTAA Project, it allows you to measure your progress
With the premium version you can use the GPS to have a better prediction based on the commerce or place where you are
Customized the velocity about the Screen-Scanning or the clicks-Time
We will ask you for certain information\nto improve your experience with OTTAA.
Hello,\nLet\'s get to know each other a little bit.

○With Explanatory Videos
○With 6 specialised modules
○Autonomous and at your own pace
○Completely free of charge
○40 minutes long
Our free workshop allows you to learn how to use OTTAA
Choose a character that best represents you.
Select now how you would like to learn how to use OTTAA, you can go back to this screen later on.
We offer you several options to\nlearn how to use it and get the most out of it.
We are helping thousand of speech impaired children to communicate, improving their life quality
Check if the info is correct,\nif not, change it as you wish. This will help us to personalize the app for you.
" ○30 minutes demo ○Guided tour to main features ○New features explained ○Absolutely FREE "
Book a demo with one of our specialist to help you better understand our AAC
These data are necessary for prediction
You can use a pictogram more than once when putting together a sentence.
OTTAA says the pictogram name at the touch it
" Please, create a phrase and select the share button"
Created Phrases in the last 7 days
OTTAA-Score is a measure of the app\'s general use, using data such as the use of the last days and the average pictograms by phrase.

This is a free trial version of the alternative augmentative communication software whose main objective is to enable families of people with disabilities and professionals and companions, to preliminarily check whether or not this tool works for the particular case before purchasing the communicator. OTTAA Premium isn\'t free and has multiple functionalities and essential services to reach the maximum potential of the user. This way, the patient, their family members and their professionals can carry out a \"functional test\" with the free software. The origin of this version of the App is found in the company\'s ethics of impact, avoiding unnecessary expenses and maximizing the correct use of resources by families with disabilities and other related institutions. For more details do not hesitate to contact us.
This pictogram is already in the sentence
Choose the pictograms you like the most, and with the help of Chatgpt, you will create a story.
Please add a favourite phrase by choosing the edit button.
